Summary: Mom called me out, saw something in the night sky that looked like it was on fire. It looked like it burst, left trails of sparks and suddenly it disinegrated.
divs: sighting detailsit was in chula vista, ca. i was studying with my sister when my mom (who was outside) noticed something outside in the sky. i walked out and there was this thing on fire far up in the sky in front of us. i think it was quiet, i don't exactly remember. but we were the only ones who spotted it. it looked like it was going down, then it burst and a trail of sparks was left behind. it suddenly got less fiery and dissapeared. it was really weird- i expected to hear about it in the news, but nobody else i've talked to has seen it. i was like 'wow! it's a u.f.o!'- i was excited and a bit fearful. i tried to take a picture but i didn't have a camera on me :\ p.s- i'm not sure of the exact date i apologize
